Package heartbeat

Interface IHeartBeatManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
HeartbeatManager
public interface IHeartBeatManager
Interface for component managing heartbeat. A heartbeat is a continuous ping-pong between the master and the worker. Every worker is a heartbeat server that must respond to the request within a duration. The port of the worker uniquely identifies the worker across all other components.
Author:
somilgupta

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  IHeartBeatManager.Mode
    Used by the implementation to identify the mode it is to work in and corresponding business logic (Runnable) to implement.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static boolean DEBUG  
    static int HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL
    Interval between 2 heartbeats.
    static java.lang.String HEARTBEAT_REQ_MESSAGE
    Message sent in heartbeat request from Master.
    static java.lang.String HEARTBEAT_RES_MESSAGE
    Message returned in heartbeat response from Worker.
    static int WORKER_RESPONSE_WAIT_TIME
    Max time to wait for the response from worker before issuing missing heartbeat.

  • Method Summary

    Specific log message for heartbeat manager component.
    void stopHeartBeat​(int port)
    Explicitly kill the heartbeat for the given workerId.

  • Method Details

    • handleMissingHeartbeat

      void handleMissingHeartbeat​(int port)
      Handler function for missing heartbeat. The function must notify resource manager to create new resource and task allocator to deallocate tasks for the failed node with the port number of that worker.
      Parameters:
      port - Port number of the worker that missed heartbeat.

    • addNewHeartBeat

      void addNewHeartBeat​(int port)
      Register new heartbeat a worker active at port given.
      Parameters:
      port - Port number of the new worker.

    • stopHeartBeat

      void stopHeartBeat​(int port)
      Explicitly kill the heartbeat for the given workerId. This is done when master wants to stop the worker preemptively.
      Parameters:
      port - Port number of the worker to be killed.

    • log

      static void log​(IHeartBeatManager.Mode mode, java.lang.String message)
      Specific log message for heartbeat manager component.
      Parameters:
      mode - Server/Client.
      message - Specific message.
